text:
What's new and exciting in the CrankShaft world? ... how can I help?
Is there something I can include in the new-to-HubSpot CMS Developer Discovery Kit?

I would say beyond simply stating that crankshaft is an up and coming project, I wouldn’t yet promote it heavily in the developer discovery kit. Just because we’re still in the early days. Once we atleast have the css grid work done then it will be something people will want to use in their work.

As far as help - we just need more devs who are interested to share ideas, and those who have time to contribute code to give it a go
so im going to be working on a template where I a utilizing bootstrap 4 so I can actually do more work on the css portion of it to convert to hubl vars, <@U7SL518D6> ill let you know when its done
here, in-case this helps in your project: <https://github.com/TheWebTech/CrankShaft/blob/grid-feature/theme/crank_grid.css>
Even if you think it ends up being fairly customized to your project would still be great to see, we could still use it as a starting off point and tweak from there.
